data-source
***********


Description
===========

Detailed information for a data source (DataSource resource).


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* create-data-source-logging-query-data-source-details

* create-data-source-scheduled-query-data-source-obj-details

* delete

* get

* list

* list-data-source-events

* update

* update-data-source-logging-query-data-source-details

* update-data-source-scheduled-query-data-source-obj-details
